title.rendered: The Top SEO Trends You Can’t Ignore for 2020–2021 [Infograph]

content.rendered:
Are you struggling to sustain business growth?

Is your existing SEO strategy simply not cutting it?

What are the biggest SEO trends you’re missing out on in 2020–2021?

Within the span of a few months, the SEO landscape has transformed significantly. While cookie-cutter SEO techniques may have helped you get by in the past, they’ve run their course in 2020.

It’s fight or flight: you stay ahead of SEO changes and adopt new strategies or watch your business fail. As SEO experts, we at Search Berg, are here to help your business thrive.

In this infographic, we cover the top SEO trends for 2020 to help your business stand out from the massive digital competition and hold its own. We delve deep into smart 2020 SEO trends that can yield impressive conversions for startups, small businesses, and established corporations.

Stay on top of the latest SEO trends! From artificial intelligence and voice search to video marketing and semantics, here’s a glimpse into winning strategies designed to help your business rank higher, get more traffic, and more sales.

excerpt.rendered: Are you struggling to sustain business growth? Is your existing SEO strategy simply not cutting it? What are the biggest SEO trends you’re missing out on in 2020–2021?
